entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
